# hasAmbiguousLayout

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the constraints impacting the layout guide specify its location ambiguously.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var hasAmbiguousLayout: Bool { get }
```

## Debugging the layout guide

- **constraintsAffectingLayout(for:)**: The constraints that impact the layout of the guide.
